comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: 4.0b12pre

"clear list" button on download manager uses greyscale AA instead of sub-pixel AA.

Reproducible: Always

Actual Results:  
greyscale AA

Expected Results:  
sub-pixel AA
